alert.note: Alert for Cheyenne County; Kit Carson County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Goodland (Northwestern Kansas and East Central Colorado)
info.headline: Winter Storm Warning issued January 25 at 4:34PM MST until January 25 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Goodland
info.description: ...WINTER STORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ THIS AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Snow. * WHERE...Portions of northwest and west central Kansas and east central Colorado. * WHEN...Until 5 PM MST /6 PM CST/ this afternoon. * IMPACTS...Hazardous travel conditions. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Although snow has ended along and north of Interstate 70, light to moderate snow persists south of Interstate 70, mainly in Logan county Kansas, where a half inch of additional accumulation is possible through 5 pm MST. Snow will continue to decrease in coverage and intensity, ending altogether by 6 PM MST.
info.instruction: If you must travel, slow down, turn off cruise control, and exercise additional caution, particularly at intersections and highway on-ramps and off-ramps where accidents are more likely to occur. Decelerating abruptly or making sharp turns at a high rate of speed may result in loss of vehicle control. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
